posts.author: Hedsma
posts.post_text: September 17, 2019 at 10:23 AM#5Hello!Set the line after the lua to "GO" and have the lua trigger the next macro line.You need to make a "plugin" and trigger it instead of having the lua in the macro.It would looks omething like this;return function()if gma.gui.confirm('title','description') thengma.cmd('go macro (ID)')endHope it helps!//Martin

posts.author: Migs
posts.post_text: May 28, 2023 at 9:33 PM#10Here's the confirm version:CodeLUA "local accept=gma.gui.confirm('Confirmation', 'Are you sure?'); if accept then gma.cmd('macro 1.11.2') else gma.cmd('off macro 11') end"Without forgetting to set wait mode of line 1 on "Go" otherwise the macro will continue without waiting for the confirmation.
